s = input()
k = int(input())

for i in range(15):
    s = s.replace("2", "22").replace("3", "333").replace("4", "4444").replace("5", "55555").replace("6", "666666").replace("7", "7777777").replace("8", "88888888").replace("9", "999999999")

print(s[k-1])
